# Sell Party

> Live marketplace for Pokemon & Sports card collectors

Sell Party is a live streaming marketplace where card collectors buy, sell, and break packs in real-time. Think Whatnot meets eBay, built for the card collecting community.

## Features
- Live streaming sales with real-time chat and bidding
- Fixed-price and auction-style marketplace listings
- Pack break rooms with randomized spot selection
- PSA, BGS, and CGC grading integration
- Fiat and cryptocurrency payments
- Seller dashboard with analytics
- Full buyer protection on every transaction
- Mobile-first design

## Seller Tiers
- Free: $0/mo, 8% transaction fee, 50 listings, 10 streams/mo
- Pro: $29/mo, 5% transaction fee, 500 listings, unlimited streams
- Premium: $99/mo, 3% transaction fee, unlimited everything

## Card Categories
- Pokemon TCG
- Sports Cards (Baseball, Basketball, Football, Hockey)
- Yu-Gi-Oh!
- Magic: The Gathering
- Other Trading Card Games

## Status
Currently in waitlist phase. Join at https://sell.party

## Links
- Website: https://sell.party
- Privacy: https://sell.party/privacy.html
